Text:
"..and here we see..." again poor quality video and even worse audio than the last one against the papacy. Much of the history was good and I have heard most of it before, but when he starts bible punching at the end I start yawning. In his anti Vatican lecture he points out that England has sought to allow freedom of religion and thought, which he praises. Here at the end he quotes too much anti Jewish text from the bible, which was not written by Jesus but the same Roman sources that he objects to in his first lecture. Saying that "Jesus rejects those that reject him" or he "rejects the Jews" is not the sort of thing I imagine would be said by Jesus. Yet constantly adding "...Jesus the greatest Jew of all time.." is a contradiction as big as the bible itself or his following statement that by accepting Jesus we become more Jewish than the Jews. Stick to the history and quit the preaching. Being the son of a preacher man myself I am sick and tired of the bible being quoted as the word of God. It is the word of man, written for political reasons, namely to continue the Roman empire through the very papacy this guy can't stand. 

Once again a slide-show with commentary from NZ geezer with a laser pointer. Must have been made this century though as he does mention Bush and Gore, probably around 2000/2001 but pre 9/11 cuz he would have had a field day with that as did everyone else. Incidentally how come Bush & Co. aren't facing charges. Blair instead of being in the dock is now set to cock-up the EU as unelected President after screwing Britain as PM. Seems that nothing changes and Obama changes nothing.

This is factual information nicely put together that maybe disturbing to some people.  He elegantly links world zionism  to control of the worlds money supply in which they ar master and we, servants. 
Communism and bolshevism is just a facade for world jewry.  Eastern Europeans have already known that for quite some time being victims of NKVD Bolsevik genoside.  In 1918  59/62 of the leading Russian communists were jews.  No need to blow a gasket, its just a fact.
Guess who is not happy with this video....
WTF!!!!!!! This better not screw with my system or I will be the rabbit with the gun.
